CUMULATIVE ANALYSIS (Based on Months Since Deployment)
1. Fill in the YELLOW cells with your baseline (before) data
2. Fill in the BLUE cells with your current (after) data
3. Enter implementation and ongoing costs at the top
4. Formulas will automatically calculate improvements and ROI
5. Review the ROI Calculation Summary section for key metrics
